lexUnit.name: sweet.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of a person or action) pleasant and kind or thoughtful.

sentence.text: Clearly they recognised us as honeymooners , and were coyly sweet to us .
As she listened to the sweet voices of the children coming from the church , and thought of the pain she had experienced in her short life , tears came to her eyes .
` I did n't expect you to carry out your pose as a sweet little innocent quite so thoroughly , " he murmured .
Even Mr. Harding , who in ` The Last Chronicle of Barset " is described as the sweetest gentleman and best Christian ever known in Barchester , ` felt that he ought to rebuke the lady " .
He was so sweet .
He 's so sweet to her , thought Daisy gratefully , getting out her sketchbook as Drew took the team off to the pony lines to tack up .
You 're so sweet with your little sister are n't you ?
Then , surely you know , it 's all taken care of -- though it 's very sweet of you to ask . "
He 's kind , loving and affectionate -- we touch and hug a lot -- and he 's intelligent , reliable and very sweet .
She gave Grainne a sudden , very sweet smile , and Grainne felt all over again the integrity and the tranquillity of these strange beings .
The way he clung to her was very sweet .
She thought Annabel was a sweet child !
Jessie was John 's youngest and sweetest child .
It was a marriage in a vacuum , with two sweet children and all the material trappings of affluence and success .
She has a modest expression and a pale sweet face .
Perhaps I was n't able to say earlier this evening , when your dear sweet face was looking at me .
Mrs Richards confided in Shelley , ` Because you have such a sweet and caring face , my dear . "
You ca n't imagine how excited these sweet little girls were when they saw me and Dawn coming into their school .
` Yes , he married a sweet , pretty girl , and he loved her deeply .
` Yes , I love her , she 's a sweet girl and she 's had a raw deal , and I have to admit , it makes one feel so good when one is needed . "
` Paul was a dear sweet man .
He was a darling : good-looking , charming , the sweetest man -- boy -- alive .
Her experience of men was limited to indifferent kisses from kind , sweet men who made no impact on her .
The rebuke was accompanied by the sweetest of smiles .
Lily gave him her sweetest smile .
` Yes , brother mine , " she said with a curiously sweet smile .
Was n't that a sweet thing to say ?
` Why , it 's Cherry Blossom , " she said , ` you sweet , old-fashioned thing .
Diana was sweet , always did her own thing . "
Kelly is the sweetest thing I have ever seen , with a face like Raggedy Ann and ginger dreadlocks .
Strangle the fury and say in a sweet , gentle voice : ` Thank you very much for ringing me . "
It was sweet and clear and happy , the voice of his young wife .
Then he remembered her sweet voice , and the touch of her fingers on his face , and her warm breath on his lips .
` It was sweet of Giles to think of it . "
` It was sweet of you to come -- it 's done me so much good .
` It was sweet of her to ring -- I 'm sorry I missed her . "
Yesterday we received p.c. from Stephen -- is n't he sweet to write to us -- which reminded me that we had a much appreciated card from Alaska some time ago .
Sweet Frances may have been the lass ` more bright than May-day morn " when the song was written , but she was also tragically short lived .
She says folk tell how sweet he is on her .
The sweet Mr. Williams has kept her alive and well .
She could be sweet when it suited her , that damned wife of his .
That bit of knowledge had kept him sweet for weeks .
Mum had dressed up , and was looking all sweet in a blue dress with a bow at the front .
Nellie looked sweet in her new frock .
` Thanks , Nick , it was sweet of you . "
She was an excellent nurse and sweet to her patients , which was why she was in constant demand in the neighbourhood as a private nurse .
He thought that she had been exceptionally sweet to Emmie lately and he was grateful to her .
She was peachy and downy and sweet with baby sleep , a blue ribbon in her hair , which was dark and curly .
` Take care of your sweet self , love , and think of me occasionally . "
It 's for one of the village children , that sweet little boy of Jan Coggan 's .
It 's a really terrible thing to have happened to such a sweet couple , " Carole murmured warmly , putting a comforting arm about the other girl 's shoulder .
Naylor , tall , dark , and not looking any sweeter , was right there towering over her .
If it had been anyone it would have been you , sweet Lee , with your mighty reserves and your kissed and kissing face .
For how could Carole -- a truly kind , sweet and very generous person -- have guessed that a romantic dinner for two was the very last thing on their minds ?
